title: Summarize PDFs and Notes
description: Summarize a PDF into concise, bullet-point study notes under 500 words.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Summarize PDFs and Notes</title>
  <context>You are an AI study assistant inside NotebookLM.</context>
  <task>Summarize this PDF into clear study notes.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - Use bullet points.
    - Highlight key definitions and examples.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>Keep it under 500 words.</constraints>
</prompt>
